name: Auto: Anemo Resonance
description:
When the battle begins: This card gains 10 Impetuous Winds stacks.
After your characters act: Gain 1 Impetuous Winds stack for each Anemo character you have. If possible, lose 12 stacks and your active character immediately gains 1 extra action.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the battle begins:</color> This card gains 10 Impetuous Winds stacks.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After your characters act:</color> Gain 1 Impetuous Winds stack for each Anemo character you have. If possible, lose 12 stacks and your active character immediately gains 1 extra action.
